title: / library existing eligible religious structure, school, dispensary, gymnasium run by Public Authority or Charitable Trust etc
clause_text: / library existing eligible religious structure, school, dispensary, gymnasium run by Public Authority or Charitable Trust etc. as per provision of 8.1 & 8.2 and additional amenities & facilities to be provided as per regulation no. 7.1 below.
